children.value: Welcome to the South Gate!
Your new adventure begins here!
I see that you bought a lot of things!
By the way, some of the organizations of the university have arrived to their booths!
Go talk to 4 of them to know more about what they have in store.
Return to me once your finish. Enjoy! Animo La Salle!
Come back to me once your done talking to the four organizations.
Enjoy! Animo La Salle!
Congratulations! Here is an award.
You look a bit flushed. Are you okay?
Hi! I am the president of the La Salle Dance Company-Street!
There are other 2 divisions namely Folk and Contemporary.
We compete in dance competitions!
Come and audition!
I come from the Archers Network which is also known as ARCH!
It is the premier online television network organization of DLSU.
We provide a platform for multimedia content creation and an avenue for stories to be told by Lasallians.
We do event coverage, online livestreaming, and many other more. Join us now!
The Green Giant FM provides services in events hosting, media coverage, voice overs, and on-air/online promotions.
We broadcast live on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 7:30 AM to 9:15 PM.
For Wednesdays and Fridays, we do it from 7:30 AM to 4:00 PM.
Let your talent shine here in GGFM!
I am from the Council of Student Organizations or CSO.
We monitor all the existing Recognized Student Organizations (RSOs) in the university.
We operate to ensure policies are followed and enforced harmoniously between all the RSOs.
Come and join CSO now!

objects.name: TransitionText
objects.string: You entered the campus and wandered around...

parameters: 05 Welcome to the World of Pokmon!.mp3
